scripts.install:server: cd node-server && if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install; fi
scripts.install:client: cd hydrogen-quickstart && if [ ! -d node_modules ]; then npm install --legacy-peer-deps; fi
scripts.start:all: concurrently -k -s first "npm run install:server && npm run install:client && npm run start:db && npm run wait-for-db && npm run start:server" "npm run wait-on:server && npm run start:client"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
